definitionBody:
BEGIN
  -- Resetear contadores diarios para usuarios activos
  UPDATE `sunny-advantage-471523-b3.IS_Fundamentales.api_tokens`
  SET request_count_today = 0
  WHERE status = 'active';
  
  -- Log de ejecución (opcional, si tienes tabla de logs)
  -- INSERT INTO logs (procedure_name, executed_at, rows_affected)
  -- VALUES ('sp_reset_daily_counters', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), @@row_count);
END
